dataQuery.sqlStatement: SELECT :P_IMPORT_EXPORT import_export, :P_SAIL_STATUS sail_status, :P_FROM_DATE from_date, :P_TO_DATE to_date FROM DUAL

SELECT c.shipper, c.consignee, c.commodity, c.origin, c.destination, c.carrier, TRIM(TO_CHAR(ROUND((((SUM(ppd_sell_cost) + SUM(col_sell_cost)) - (SUM(ppd_buy_cost) + SUM(col_buy_cost))) / 2),2),'999,999,990.00')) crest_share, (CASE WHEN c.sell_base_rate_terms = 'PPD' THEN TRIM(TO_CHAR((ROUND((((SUM(ppd_sell_cost) + SUM(col_sell_cost)) - (SUM(ppd_buy_cost) + SUM(col_buy_cost))) / 2),2) + SUM(col_buy_cost)),'999,999,990.00')) ELSE TRIM(TO_CHAR(-(ROUND((((SUM(ppd_sell_cost) + SUM(col_sell_cost)) - (SUM(ppd_buy_cost) + SUM(col_buy_cost))) / 2),2) + SUM(ppd_buy_cost)),'999,999,990.00')) END) crest_due, c.hbl_num, c.container_count FROM (SELECT DISTINCT b.shipper, b.consignee, b.commodity, b.origin, b.destination, b.carrier, b.hbl_num, b.container_count, (CASE WHEN b.base_rate_terms = 'PPD' THEN b.sell_cost ELSE 0 END) ppd_sell_cost, (CASE WHEN b.base_rate_terms = 'COL' THEN b.sell_cost ELSE 0 END) col_sell_cost, (CASE WHEN b.base_rate_terms = 'PPD' THEN b.buy_cost ELSE 0 END) ppd_buy_cost, (CASE WHEN b.base_rate_terms = 'COL' THEN b.buy_cost ELSE 0 END) col_buy_cost, b.sell_base_rate_terms FROM (SELECT DISTINCT a.shipper, a.consignee, a.commodity, (CASE WHEN SUBSTR(a.origin,1,2) = ', ' OR SUBSTR(a.origin,-2) = ', ' THEN REPLACE(a.origin,', ','') ELSE a.origin END) origin, (CASE WHEN SUBSTR(a.destination,1,2) = ', ' OR SUBSTR(a.destination,-2) = ', ' THEN REPLACE(a.destination,', ','') ELSE a.destination END) destination, a.carrier, a.hbl_num, (CASE WHEN TRIM(a.container_count) = 'X' then '' ELSE a.container_count END) container_count, (CASE WHEN sc.payment_method_code_gid = 'PPD' OR (sc.payment_method_code_gid IS NULL AND a.payment_method_code_gid = 'PPD') THEN 'PPD' WHEN sc.payment_method_code_gid = 'COL' OR (sc.payment_method_code_gid IS NULL AND a.payment_method_code_gid = 'COL') THEN 'COL' ELSE '' END) base_rate_terms, a.sell_base_rate_terms, (CASE WHEN sh.perspective = 'S' THEN sc.cost ELSE 0 END) sell_cost, (CASE WHEN sh.perspective = 'B' THEN sc.cost ELSE 0 END) buy_cost FROM (SELECT DISTINCT j.job_gid, glogowner.xxscou_nvo_report_functions.entity_location_name(s.shipment_gid,'XXX','SHIPPER') shipper, glogowner.xxscou_nvo_report_functions.entity_location_name(s.shipment_gid,'XXX','ULTIMATE CONSIGNEE') consignee, srem.remark_text commodity, glogowner.xxscou_nvo_report_functions.loc_city_province(cv.source_location_gid) origin, glogowner.xxscou_nvo_report_functions.loc_city_province(cv.dest_location_gid) destination, loc.location_name carrier, 'TSC' || j.job_xid hbl_num, TRIM((SELECT LISTAGG(TRIM(TO_CHAR(SUM(TO_NUMBER(charter_voyage_refnum_value)), '999,999,990') || ' X ' || (CASE WHEN cvr.charter_voyage_refnum_qual_gid LIKE '%20%COUNT%' THEN '20FT' WHEN cvr.charter_voyage_refnum_qual_gid LIKE '%TEU%COUNT%' THEN '20FT' WHEN cvr.charter_voyage_refnum_qual_gid LIKE '%40%COUNT%' THEN '40FT' WHEN cvr.charter_voyage_refnum_qual_gid LIKE '%45%COUNT%' THEN '45FT' END)), ' ') WITHIN GROUP (ORDER BY cvr.charter_voyage_refnum_qual_gid) FROM charter_voyage_refnum cvr WHERE cvr.charter_voyage_gid = cv.charter_voyage_gid AND LENGTH(TRIM(TRANSLATE(cvr.charter_voyage_refnum_value, ' +-.0123456789',' '))) IS NULL AND (cvr.charter_voyage_refnum_qual_gid LIKE '%20%COUNT%' OR cvr.charter_voyage_refnum_qual_gid LIKE '%TEU%COUNT%' OR cvr.charter_voyage_refnum_qual_gid LIKE '%40%COUNT%' OR cvr.charter_voyage_refnum_qual_gid LIKE '%45%COUNT%') GROUP BY charter_voyage_refnum_qual_gid)) container_count, s.payment_method_code_gid, (CASE WHEN sh.payment_method_code_gid = 'PPD' OR (sh.payment_method_code_gid IS NULL AND s.payment_method_code_gid = 'PPD') THEN 'PPD' WHEN sh.payment_method_code_gid = 'COL' OR (sh.payment_method_code_gid IS NULL AND s.payment_method_code_gid = 'COL') THEN 'COL' ELSE '' END) sell_base_rate_terms, sh.shipment_gid primary_shipment_gid FROM job j INNER JOIN job_order_release_join jorj ON j.job_gid = jorj.job_gid INNER JOIN view_shipment_order_release vsor ON jorj.order_release_gid = vsor.order_release_gid INNER JOIN shipment ship ON vsor.shipment_gid = ship.shipment_gid AND ship.is_primary = 'Y' INNER JOIN shipment_status sstat ON ship.shipment_gid = sstat.shipment_gid AND sstat.status_type_gid = 'SCOULAR/NVO.ENROUTE' INNER JOIN view_shipment_order_release vsor1 ON jorj.order_release_gid = vsor1.order_release_gid AND vsor1.shipment_gid IN ( SELECT ship1.shipment_gid FROM shipment ship1 WHERE vsor1.shipment_gid = ship1.shipment_gid AND ship1.shipment_type_gid = 'TRANSPORT' AND ship1.transport_mode_gid = 'VESSEL-CO' AND ship1.perspective = 'B' AND ship1.is_primary = 'Y') INNER JOIN shipment s ON vsor1.shipment_gid = s.shipment_gid AND s.shipment_type_gid = 'TRANSPORT' AND s.transport_mode_gid = 'VESSEL-CO' AND s.is_primary = 'Y' AND s.perspective = 'B' INNER JOIN location loc1 ON s.source_location_gid = loc1.location_gid AND loc1.country_code3_gid IN ('USA','CAN','MEX') INNER JOIN location loc2 ON s.dest_location_gid = loc2.location_gid AND loc2.country_code3_gid = 'IND' INNER JOIN shipment_involved_party sip1 ON s.shipment_gid = sip1.shipment_gid AND sip1.involved_party_qual_gid = 'FINAL_DESTINATION_AGENT' INNER JOIN contact c1 ON sip1.involved_party_contact_gid = c1.contact_gid AND c1.contact_xid IN ('CRESTU','CRESJO','CRESMU','TSCCRST','CRESDU','CRESRA') LEFT OUTER JOIN view_shipment_order_release vsor2 ON jorj.order_release_gid = vsor2.order_release_gid AND vsor2.shipment_gid IN ( SELECT ship2.shipment_gid FROM shipment ship2 WHERE vsor2.shipment_gid = ship2.shipment_gid AND ship2.shipment_type_gid = 'TRANSPORT' AND ship2.transport_mode_gid = 'VESSEL-CO' AND ship2.perspective = 'S' AND ship2.is_primary = 'Y') LEFT OUTER JOIN shipment sh ON vsor2.shipment_gid = sh.shipment_gid AND sh.shipment_type_gid = 'TRANSPORT' AND sh.transport_mode_gid = 'VESSEL-CO' AND sh.is_primary = 'Y' AND sh.perspective = 'S' LEFT OUTER JOIN shipment_cost sc ON sh.shipment_gid = sc.shipment_gid LEFT OUTER JOIN shipment_refnum sr ON s.shipment_gid = sr.shipment_gid AND sr.shipment_refnum_qual_gid = 'CHARTER VOYAGE' LEFT OUTER JOIN charter_voyage cv ON 'SCOULAR/NVO.' || sr.shipment_refnum_value = cv.charter_voyage_gid LEFT OUTER JOIN location loc ON cv.servprov_gid = loc.location_gid LEFT OUTER JOIN shipment_remark srem ON s.shipment_gid = srem.shipment_gid AND srem.remark_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR/NVO.HBL DESCRIPTION OF CARGO' AND srem.remark_sequence = 1 WHERE j.move_perspective_gid = 'EXPORT' AND ((:P_SAIL_STATUS = 'BOOKED' AND sstat.status_value_gid = 'SCOULAR/NVO.ENROUTE_NOT STARTED') OR (:P_SAIL_STATUS = 'SAILED' AND NOT cv.actual_departure_date IS NULL) OR (:P_SAIL_STATUS = 'ARRIVED' AND sstat.status_value_gid = 'SCOULAR/NVO.ENROUTE_COMPLETED')) AND (TO_DATE(j.insert_date,'dd-mm-rr') >= TO_DATE(:P_FROM_DATE,'YYYY-MM-DD') AND TO_DATE(j.insert_date,'dd-mm-rr') <= TO_DATE(:P_TO_DATE,'YYYY-MM-DD')) AND (:P_IMPORT_EXPORT = 'EXPORT' OR :P_IMPORT_EXPORT = 'BOTH') UNION SELECT DISTINCT j.job_gid, glogowner.xxscou_nvo_report_functions.entity_location_name(s.shipment_gid,'XXX','SHIPPER') shipper, glogowner.xxscou_nvo_report_functions.entity_location_name(s.shipment_gid,'XXX','ULTIMATE CONSIGNEE') consignee, srem.remark_text commodity, glogowner.xxscou_nvo_report_functions.loc_city_province(cv.source_location_gid) origin, glogowner.xxscou_nvo_report_functions.loc_city_province(cv.dest_location_gid) destination, loc.location_name carrier, 'TSC' || j.job_xid hbl_num, TRIM((SELECT LISTAGG(TRIM(TO_CHAR(SUM(TO_NUMBER(charter_voyage_refnum_value)), '999,999,990') || ' X ' || (CASE WHEN cvr.charter_voyage_refnum_qual_gid LIKE '%20%COUNT%' THEN '20FT' WHEN cvr.charter_voyage_refnum_qual_gid LIKE '%TEU%COUNT%' THEN '20FT' WHEN cvr.charter_voyage_refnum_qual_gid LIKE '%40%COUNT%' THEN '40FT' WHEN cvr.charter_voyage_refnum_qual_gid LIKE '%45%COUNT%' THEN '45FT' END)), ' ') WITHIN GROUP (ORDER BY cvr.charter_voyage_refnum_qual_gid) FROM charter_voyage_refnum cvr WHERE cvr.charter_voyage_gid = cv.charter_voyage_gid AND LENGTH(TRIM(TRANSLATE(cvr.charter_voyage_refnum_value, ' +-.0123456789',' '))) IS NULL AND (cvr.charter_voyage_refnum_qual_gid LIKE '%20%COUNT%' OR cvr.charter_voyage_refnum_qual_gid LIKE '%TEU%COUNT%' OR cvr.charter_voyage_refnum_qual_gid LIKE '%40%COUNT%' OR cvr.charter_voyage_refnum_qual_gid LIKE '%45%COUNT%') GROUP BY charter_voyage_refnum_qual_gid)) container_count, s.payment_method_code_gid, (CASE WHEN sh.payment_method_code_gid = 'PPD' OR (sh.payment_method_code_gid IS NULL AND s.payment_method_code_gid = 'PPD') THEN 'PPD' WHEN sh.payment_method_code_gid = 'COL' OR (sh.payment_method_code_gid IS NULL AND s.payment_method_code_gid = 'COL') THEN 'COL' ELSE '' END) sell_base_rate_terms, sh.shipment_gid primary_shipment_gid FROM job j INNER JOIN job_order_release_join jorj ON j.job_gid = jorj.job_gid INNER JOIN view_shipment_order_release vsor ON jorj.order_release_gid = vsor.order_release_gid INNER JOIN shipment ship ON vsor.shipment_gid = ship.shipment_gid AND ship.is_primary = 'Y' INNER JOIN shipment_status sstat ON ship.shipment_gid = sstat.shipment_gid AND sstat.status_type_gid = 'SCOULAR/NVO.ENROUTE' INNER JOIN view_shipment_order_release vsor1 ON jorj.order_release_gid = vsor1.order_release_gid AND vsor1.shipment_gid IN ( SELECT ship1.shipment_gid FROM shipment ship1 WHERE vsor1.shipment_gid = ship1.shipment_gid AND ship1.shipment_type_gid = 'TRANSPORT' AND ship1.transport_mode_gid = 'VESSEL-CO' AND ship1.perspective = 'B' AND ship1.is_primary = 'Y') INNER JOIN shipment s ON vsor1.shipment_gid = s.shipment_gid AND s.shipment_type_gid = 'TRANSPORT' AND s.transport_mode_gid = 'VESSEL-CO' AND s.is_primary = 'Y' AND s.perspective = 'B' INNER JOIN location loc1 ON s.source_location_gid = loc1.location_gid AND loc1.country_code3_gid = 'IND' LEFT OUTER JOIN view_shipment_order_release vsor2 ON jorj.order_release_gid = vsor2.order_release_gid AND vsor2.shipment_gid IN ( SELECT ship2.shipment_gid FROM shipment ship2 WHERE vsor2.shipment_gid = ship2.shipment_gid AND ship2.shipment_type_gid = 'TRANSPORT' AND ship2.transport_mode_gid = 'VESSEL-CO' AND ship2.perspective = 'S' AND ship2.is_primary = 'Y') LEFT OUTER JOIN shipment sh ON vsor2.shipment_gid = sh.shipment_gid AND sh.shipment_type_gid = 'TRANSPORT' AND sh.transport_mode_gid = 'VESSEL-CO' AND sh.is_primary = 'Y' AND sh.perspective = 'S' LEFT OUTER JOIN shipment_cost sc ON sh.shipment_gid = sc.shipment_gid LEFT OUTER JOIN shipment_refnum sr ON s.shipment_gid = sr.shipment_gid AND sr.shipment_refnum_qual_gid = 'CHARTER VOYAGE' LEFT OUTER JOIN charter_voyage cv ON 'SCOULAR/NVO.' || sr.shipment_refnum_value = cv.charter_voyage_gid LEFT OUTER JOIN location loc ON cv.servprov_gid = loc.location_gid LEFT OUTER JOIN shipment_remark srem ON s.shipment_gid = srem.shipment_gid AND srem.remark_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR/NVO.HBL DESCRIPTION OF CARGO' AND srem.remark_sequence = 1 WHERE j.move_perspective_gid = 'IMPORT' AND j.user_defined1_icon_gid = 'SHIP_CARR' AND ((:P_SAIL_STATUS = 'BOOKED' AND sstat.status_value_gid = 'SCOULAR/NVO.ENROUTE_NOT STARTED') OR (:P_SAIL_STATUS = 'SAILED' AND NOT cv.actual_departure_date IS NULL) OR (:P_SAIL_STATUS = 'ARRIVED' AND sstat.status_value_gid = 'SCOULAR/NVO.ENROUTE_COMPLETED')) AND (TO_DATE(j.insert_date,'dd-mm-rr') >= TO_DATE(:P_FROM_DATE,'YYYY-MM-DD') AND TO_DATE(j.insert_date,'dd-mm-rr') <= TO_DATE(:P_TO_DATE,'YYYY-MM-DD')) AND (:P_IMPORT_EXPORT = 'IMPORT' OR :P_IMPORT_EXPORT = 'BOTH') ORDER BY hbl_num) a INNER JOIN job_order_release_join jorjoin ON a.job_gid = jorjoin.job_gid INNER JOIN view_shipment_order_release vsorel ON jorjoin.order_release_gid = vsorel.order_release_gid AND vsorel.shipment_gid IN ( SELECT ship.shipment_gid FROM shipment ship WHERE vsorel.shipment_gid = ship.shipment_gid AND ship.shipment_type_gid = 'TRANSPORT' AND ship.transport_mode_gid = 'VESSEL-CO') INNER JOIN shipment sh ON vsorel.shipment_gid = sh.shipment_gid AND sh.shipment_type_gid = 'TRANSPORT' AND sh.transport_mode_gid = 'VESSEL-CO' INNER JOIN shipment_cost sc ON sh.shipment_gid = sc.shipment_gid ORDER BY a.hbl_num) b) c GROUP BY c.shipper, c.consignee, c.commodity, c.origin, c.destination, c.carrier, c.hbl_num, c.container_count, c.sell_base_rate_terms
